english.segment1: Pretty Pretty, she looks so needy. Shes calm in the face, but shes never forgetting every other time Ive been. Angry, raging, clenched up hands. But I know better than to mix you in my raging cycle in this unstable mind.
english.segment2: I dont want to let you down. I want this to feel the same. I dont want to let you down. Im all thats in our way.
english.segment3: Pretty Pretty, shes slowing fading. Ive drained her empty and left her missing how I was when I was sane. Im drowning in what I became. Stretched so thin that I am slowly tearing. Im left unfulfilled and deteriorating.
english.segment4: I dont want to let you down. I want this to feel the same. I dont want to let you down. Im all thats in our way.
english.segment5: Waiting, hoping, praying for a settle to this dizzy mind. Feeling that my sanity will be coupled with my demise.
english.segment6: I dont want to let you down. I want this to feel the same. I dont want to let you down. Im all thats in our way.
